Digital Banking Enrolment

Bank with First Horizon Bank anytime, anywhere*.

We are excited you have chosen to add Digital and Mobile Banking to your account. Enrollment is quick, easy and complete in about five minutes.

What you’ll need:

  • Your debit card OR ATM card
  • Your account number
  • An email address

What you’ll be able to access:

  • Digital Banking
  • Mobile Banking via your smartphone or tablet
  • Mobile Deposit
  • Online Bill Pay and Transfers

Insurance Products and Annuities: May be purchased from any agent or company, and the customer’s choice will not affect current or future credit decisions. Trust services and financial planning provided by First Horizon Bank.
